definition: erhua variant of 使勁|使劲[shi3 jin4]
to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: He squeezed his nose, closed his mouth, and blew really hard.
sentences.chinese: 他挤挤鼻子，合上嘴，并且使劲儿吹。
这时，有人使劲儿把我摇醒。

sentences.english: The cyclist rang his bell loudly.
sentences.chinese: 骑车的人使劲儿按车铃。

sentences.english: The little children sat on the sledge steadily with their elder brother pulling from in the front.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子安稳地坐在冰床上，哥哥在前面使劲儿拉。

sentences.english: She gave the floor a vigorous sponge all over.
sentences.chinese: 她用海绵把地板使劲儿擦了一遍。

sentences.english: His lips worked as he tried to swallow the food.
sentences.chinese: 他使劲儿把食物咽下去，嘴唇都扭曲起来。

definition: all one's strength/with might and main
erhua variant of 死勁|死劲[si3 jin4]
vigorously/to the utmost/to the best of one's ability
to pull/to stretch/to draw sth out
erhua variant of 可勁|可劲[ke3 jin4]
with all one's might/with sudden force/violently/to slam
